channel.title: Custom Scape v1
channel.description:
Custom Scape v1
Before you say anything please realise that this was a VERY old project of mine. I was deleting crap out of my folders when I found this, so I decided to release. It is an Allstar Scape Base, and does come with a client that isn't a Silab client, and it works 100% from what I can tell. Please don't flame, because all it'll do is get me mad at you and so forth, just getting us both in trouble.
This is a great server for starting coders. If you need any help leave a post here, or PM me.
To make yourself an Owner, open up the server files. Then open up Character files. Find you account and open it. Use ctrl+f, and search for rights. You should find something that says "character-rights 0. Change that to a 3. To make someone an admin change theirs to 2. Mod is 1, and regular player is 0.
Credits:
60% Mod Allstar (for the base) 10% Tutorials (for commands and specials at the time) 30% Me (for most of the coding)
Features:
GS Minigame Large Variety of Shops Vengance Custom Crowns PK Box and Team PK Open unused teleports so you can make them tele you anywere Barrows Bandos and Armadyl Armor Working Farming High and Low Detail options Easy to use. Almost completly idiot proof. An Auto Restarter
Here are some pics:
Custom Crowns: [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/customcrowns.jpg[/img]
Slayer: [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/slayer.jpg[/img]
Skilling: [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/skilling.jpg[/img]
Farming: [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/farming.jpg[/img]
GodSwords: [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/godswords.jpg[/img]
Barrows: [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/barrows.jpg[/img]
GodSword MiniGame: [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/gsmini.jpg[/img]
Shops: [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/shops.jpg[/img]
Team PK: [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/teampk.jpg[/img]
PK Box: [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/pkbox.jpg[/img]
I really couldn't care less if you leach this. Rep is Appriciated.
Server and Client Package: http://www.mediafire.com/?ynemgtyladj
Just the Server: http://www.mediafire.com/?n3zk223y0jk
Just the Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?ymybvkaz15a
PS: If I get a good amount of downloads and responces I may work on improving some of the glitches for a v2.
ENJOY!

item.title: Custom Scape v1
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

60% Mod Allstar (for the base) 10% Tutorials (for commands and specials at the time) 30% Me (for most of the coding)

Now maybe its just me, But I could of sworn Allstar did most of the coding. And it looks like alot of this stuff is basic allstar anyway. Ive seen that skilling zone on like 30 servers. Same for barrows and godsword minigame. I havnt seen a pkbox like that, But most everything else I see seems to have been on many other sources before this one. Tbh It looks uniqe in some way, but I hardly think you did MOST of the programming. Most people including myself dont do most of the programming, Most bases come with lvling combat playersave specials teleports most methods built. So all there is to do is rework them and make them better. I think you could have done a lot more before releasing this. Anyway, Ive seen much worse work. Gj 6/10

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

painful:

sorry but i couldent really understand im new to servers(i only haveabout 98 users) but is this copyright? before i download- sorry for being sutch a noob

Lol, the 98 users this is a lie. Technically speaking, every server is copyrighted by Jagex, because we’re using they’re coding. It’s safe to use though. I doubt you can get over 40 players on an AllStar base, so you almost have no chance of getting sued

item.title: Custom Scape v1
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

[quote=“Jake Bryan Jones, post:21, topic:321348”]The pkbox looks like just the Cached is messed up with the Objects.

This is Allstarscape, Although I’m glad people are useing the Classics, I would perfer them to use the Modern Servers Bases or Even Start From Scratch.

:)[/quote]
It’s not messed up objects. Though it is cache damage. I did put it this way on purpose though. Lol, like I said 100 times before, this is a VERY old project of mine. My newest project is using a battlescape base. (palidino’s) There is about 1 server that is from scratch, and that is Aryan’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Scape v1
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

Mod-Vlad-:

Erm… Just edited Allstar! I recomment you make some customs

Just about every server is just editing of another server. Customs ruin a game in my opinion…

Guardianman5:

Looks 100% leeched? maybe it’s just me but it looks like you just posted some pics and download links, so i’d say you have about .002% creds… Don’t leech, do your own work.

You sound 100% gay? That’s what you do in a server release, give pics of the server, and give the download links. I have way more than .002% credit. If you actually look into the server, you can tell I did ALOT of work on it. Don’t be so quick to judge…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

[quote=“time of rune, post:14, topic:321348”][quote author=john5689 link=topic=417802.msg3071909#msg3071909 date=1261585434]
… looks like allstar but i think u coded the pk box cuse i have never seen that b4.

Guna say like 6/10
[/quote]
It is an allstar base, and I did code the PK box. I coded alot more than just that though. Like I said before,
I added custom crowns, the pk box, working slayer, a few new shops, changed some stuff in the skilling area, added armadyl and bandos, edited a client to get it to connect so you wouldn’t have to use silab’s, and I moved the home.[/quote]
[/quote]

kk i believe you cuse of the pics but if your making a v2 them code some more otherwise im just guna lower down the rank.

Looks like you downloaded Allstar-Scape and changed the name.

I have not ever leeched a server, including this one. I added custom crowns, a pwnage new PK box(imo), working slayer, a few new shops, changed some stuff in the skilling area, added armadyl and bandos, edited a client to get it to connect so you wouldn’t have to use silab’s, and I moved the home.
